description: This Dart file defines the `RecipesProvider` class, a state management class extending `ChangeNotifier` for Flutter applications. It manages the state related to recipe data, including loading recipes from a repository, handling query updates with debounce, and notifying listeners of state changes.

classes.name: RecipesProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier-based class that manages recipe state, handles data fetching, search query updates with debounce, and error handling.

methods.name: loadInitial
methods.description: Loads initial recipes by performing a search with an empty query.

methods.name: updateQuery
methods.description: Updates the search query, sets up a debounce timer to trigger the search after user stops typing.

methods.name: _search
methods.description: Performs the asynchronous search operation by fetching recipes from the repository based on the query.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Cancels any active debounce timer and disposes of resources.
